about_the_game:
The kingdom of Caynburn has been in decline following the great war of Elkswiss and the extermination of demonkind. Without anyone to fight, its people have grown weary and tense with their neighbors, and now a reckoning is at hand.

Follow a ragtag group of heroes trying their best to hold the country together as they battle their way across the countryside. Brave as you may be, noble as you may be, the world will not always be kind, but a dim hope keeps a brighter future in sight. That someday this bloodshed will all have been worth a chance at a lasting peace.



No sending your subjects to fight on your behalf, master the strengths and weaknesses of a diverse set of characters and their quirks to carve a new future. Enjoy classic tactical gameplay inspired by Fire Emblem-style games with the modern refinements of contemporary games like Super Robot Wars, XCOM and more.

Each character's level ups can be manually configured, with upgradeable classes that can be changed freely to give the player maximum customization with their units. Overcome impossible odds and crush your opponents with your strategic prowess by using the classes that fit your playstyle.



Follow a colorful group of heroes through a hand-crafted campaign with colorful complicated characters, as they try to find an end to the chaos engulfing the land. Get to know the cast and their struggles through camp dialogs and make a mark on the world.



Traverse your nightmares as you play the customizable roguelike campaign, Cinders of Lament. Utilize your favorite characters and unlock new units exclusive to the mode. Choose your path, fight, rest, loot, and make tough choices in dozens of special events to try to find salvation.
